R.content: sovereignty: silent and unavowable, betrays democracy, the stigmatic point of an indivisible instant
R.linkedContent: sovereignty: silent and unavowable, betrays democracy, the stigmatic point of an indivisible instant

H.content: mourning is not allowed without a fixed (arrêté) place, monument, determinable topos, stopping point (arrêt) > promised w/out taking place, only possible mourning is an impossible one
H.linkedContent: mourning is not allowed without a fixed (arrêté) place, monument, determinable topos, stopping point (arrêt) > promised w/out taking place, only possible mourning is an impossible one

BL.content: most difficult points [the question of Kafka]
BL.linkedContent: most difficult points [the question of Kafka]

HASD.content: for Heidegger, gathering of Geviert takes place in an indivisible topos, simplicity of point [of sword]: “the place (Ort) gathers toward itself at the greatest height and extremity”
HASD.linkedContent: for Heidegger, gathering of Geviert takes place in an indivisible topos, simplicity of point [of sword]: “the place (Ort) gathers toward itself at the greatest height and extremity”

A.content: border as limit (oros, Grenze, re: nun or Jetzt [now-point] Heidegger underlines) or border as tracing (grammē, Linie)
A.linkedContent: border as limit (oros, Grenze, re: nun or Jetzt [now-point] Heidegger underlines) or border as tracing (grammē, Linie)

A.content: methodological urgency in being-toward-death: we can only start from here (l’en deça) (not Platonic, Christian), ontico-ontological priority of Dasein, “exemplary” point of departure (that we are hear to question & wait, expect each other)
A.linkedContent: methodological urgency in being-toward-death: we can only start from here (l’en deça) (not Platonic, Christian), ontico-ontological priority of Dasein, “exemplary” point of departure (that we are hear to question & wait, expect each other)

VM.content: if Being is taken as unitary focal point of possibility of existence, predication, of copula > does not belong to realm of predication [I believe Derrida amends this stance later]
VM.linkedContent: if Being is taken as unitary focal point of possibility of existence, predication, of copula > does not belong to realm of predication [I believe Derrida amends this stance later]

PP.content: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself
PP.linkedContent: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself

PAS.content: Blanchot: “at the highest point of contradiction, I was this illegitimate dead person”
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot: “at the highest point of contradiction, I was this illegitimate dead person”

VP.content: “sharp point of the instant”: identity of lived-experience present to itself
VP.linkedContent: “sharp point of the instant”: identity of lived-experience present to itself

VP.content: if punctuality of instant is a myth, a spatial or mechanical metaphor, an inherited metaphysical concept, if presence of presence isn’t simple, all of Husserl’s logic is threatened
VP.linkedContent: if punctuality of instant is a myth, a spatial or mechanical metaphor, an inherited metaphysical concept, if presence of presence isn’t simple, all of Husserl’s logic is threatened

VP.content: Heidegger claims that Husserl, in The Phenomenology of Internal Time-Consciousness, breaks from Aristotelian concept of time as “point,” “now,” stigmē; Derrida clarifies that Husserl admits that lived-experience, spread out in “now’s,” never have a punctual phase, while always referring them back to a “source-point,” like a comet’s tail
VP.linkedContent: Heidegger claims that Husserl, in The Phenomenology of Internal Time-Consciousness, breaks from Aristotelian concept of time as “point,” “now,” stigmē; Derrida clarifies that Husserl admits that lived-experience, spread out in “now’s,” never have a punctual phase, while always referring them back to a “source-point,” like a comet’s tail

VP.content: Husserl’s punctual now, archi-form, Ur-form, not simple self-identity of present
VP.linkedContent: Husserl’s punctual now, archi-form, Ur-form, not simple self-identity of present

VP.content: “source-point,” “originary impression” which produces temporalization, is auto-affection
VP.linkedContent: “source-point,” “originary impression” which produces temporalization, is auto-affection

OH.content: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end
OH.linkedContent: Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end

OH.content: advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)
OH.linkedContent: advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)

OH.content: identification is always cultural never natural, always has a capital form, advanced point, capitalizing reserve
OH.linkedContent: identification is always cultural never natural, always has a capital form, advanced point, capitalizing reserve

OH.content: capital as cutting edge of progress (à la pointe du progrès), universalizing model, everyone joins at the head
OH.linkedContent: capital as cutting edge of progress (à la pointe du progrès), universalizing model, everyone joins at the head

OH.content: word “avant-garde” [see pp. 25, 48-50]: capitalizes on figurehead, phallic point, advanced initiative of guarding, anticipating to conserve, thus “avant-garde position”
OH.linkedContent: word “avant-garde” [see pp. 25, 48-50]: capitalizes on figurehead, phallic point, advanced initiative of guarding, anticipating to conserve, thus “avant-garde position”

FSW.content: Freud: psychic locality corresponds to an Ort, where image comes into being, ideal point, no tangible component of microscope [Freud admits imperfection of this imagery]
FSW.linkedContent: Freud: psychic locality corresponds to an Ort, where image comes into being, ideal point, no tangible component of microscope [Freud admits imperfection of this imagery]

FSW.content: writing as trace survives scratch’s present, punctuality, stigmē

PPHS.content: Hegel: productive imagination as welding Mittelpunkt (site where opposites pass into one another) [Heidegger’s gathering Ort?]
PPHS.linkedContent: Hegel: productive imagination as welding Mittelpunkt (site where opposites pass into one another) [Heidegger’s gathering Ort?]

SH.content: Baudelaire: “there is no point more piercing than that of the infinite”
SH.linkedContent: Baudelaire: “there is no point more piercing than that of the infinite”

SH.content: readability effaces the date, the very thing which it offers for reading, date must conceal w/in itself stigma of singularity if it is to last longer (lasting is the poem), only chance of spectral return, commemoration of date’s annihilation, kind of nothing or ash > ash awaits us
SH.linkedContent: readability effaces the date, the very thing which it offers for reading, date must conceal w/in itself stigma of singularity if it is to last longer (lasting is the poem), only chance of spectral return, commemoration of date’s annihilation, kind of nothing or ash > ash awaits us

F.content: “conservative” repression installs in the unconscious what the Self treats as an exquisite corpse, a “surrealism” of folded sentences loses its creases, the paper flattens out, and there is a spot (lieu) of pleasure disguised as pain, which the therapist must exhume
F.linkedContent: “conservative” repression installs in the unconscious what the Self treats as an exquisite corpse, a “surrealism” of folded sentences loses its creases, the paper flattens out, and there is a spot (lieu) of pleasure disguised as pain, which the therapist must exhume

DS.content: dialectic is beginning and end of philosophy, Mallarmé marks it w/ his syntax at the point of its sterility [MOP] > a point that will be called, analogically, provisionally, undecidable
DS.linkedContent: dialectic is beginning and end of philosophy, Mallarmé marks it w/ his syntax at the point of its sterility [MOP] > a point that will be called, analogically, provisionally, undecidable

DS.content: hymen in text (crime, sexual act, incest, suicide, simulacrum) inscribed at very tip (à la pointe) of indecision
DS.linkedContent: hymen in text (crime, sexual act, incest, suicide, simulacrum) inscribed at very tip (à la pointe) of indecision

DS.content: Mallarmé: “passing butterfly leaves a bit of sharp ingenuous nothing” —about to break through hymen
DS.linkedContent: Mallarmé: “passing butterfly leaves a bit of sharp ingenuous nothing” —about to break through hymen

DS.content: pirouette at one point—at “philosophical point,” at stigmē, here—already at another point (unties/divides along same line)
DS.linkedContent: pirouette at one point—at “philosophical point,” at stigmē, here—already at another point (unties/divides along same line)

DS.content: Mallarmé: “all method is a fiction” > point de méthode—still a marching order (marche à suivre) > la dissémination dans le repli de l’hymen, pas de méthode pour elle > [no circle-path to first step]
DS.linkedContent: Mallarmé: “all method is a fiction” > point de méthode—still a marching order (marche à suivre) > la dissémination dans le repli de l’hymen, pas de méthode pour elle > [no circle-path to first step]

OS.content: Hegel: now [point] has tremendous right (ein ungeheures Recht), it is nothing as individual Now, as I pronounce it, the proudly exclusive now dissolves, flows away, falls into dust
OS.linkedContent: Hegel: now [point] has tremendous right (ein ungeheures Recht), it is nothing as individual Now, as I pronounce it, the proudly exclusive now dissolves, flows away, falls into dust

OS.content: acc. Heidegger, [MOP] privilege of form of “now” and “point”
space becomes concrete by retaining/restoring negative w/in itself, by negating itself
OS.linkedContent: space becomes concrete by retaining/restoring negative w/in itself, by negating itself

OS.content: 1st negative determination of space is the POINT (the place that does not take place), it then negates itself in relation the LINE > als sich aufhebend, point is the line, the Being-spatial of point > then comes the PLANE (surface) > each next stage only made of the negated prior stage, i.e. line made of negated points
OS.linkedContent: 1st negative determination of space is the POINT (the place that does not take place), it then negates itself in relation the LINE > als sich aufhebend, point is the line, the Being-spatial of point > then comes the PLANE (surface) > each next stage only made of the negated prior stage, i.e. line made of negated points

OS.content: “always too late to ask the question of time” re: spatialization
OS.linkedContent: “always too late to ask the question of time” re: spatialization

OS.content: point & time thought in circularity together (Aufhebung, speculative negativity, only possible by means of infinite correlation or reflection) > time is spacing, space is time > thus for Aristotle, stigmē, punctuality, determines nowness (nun, jetzt)
OS.linkedContent: point & time thought in circularity together (Aufhebung, speculative negativity, only possible by means of infinite correlation or reflection) > time is spacing, space is time > thus for Aristotle, stigmē, punctuality, determines nowness (nun, jetzt)

OS.content: can’t extract thematic of Verfallen (re: time in Hegel & Heidegger) from ethicotheological orb, unless l’échéance de l’orbe redirected, in the void, toward un point de chute plus écarté (see DS)
OS.linkedContent: can’t extract thematic of Verfallen (re: time in Hegel & Heidegger) from ethicotheological orb, unless l’échéance de l’orbe redirected, in the void, toward un point de chute plus écarté (see DS)

OS.content: impossibility of one point being w/ another point w/out temporalization > w/ of spatial coexistence arises only out of w/ of temporalization
OS.linkedContent: impossibility of one point being w/ another point w/out temporalization > w/ of spatial coexistence arises only out of w/ of temporalization

OS.content: for Aristotle, being-together [of nun and stigmē] not a determination of Being but very production of Being > ama as the pivot (cheville) (clavis), the key opening & closing metaphysics > this complicity so self-effacing as to barely be noticed, the common origin of space & time
OS.linkedContent: for Aristotle, being-together [of nun and stigmē] not a determination of Being but very production of Being > ama as the pivot (cheville) (clavis), the key opening & closing metaphysics > this complicity so self-effacing as to barely be noticed, the common origin of space & time

OS.content: Aristotle: points like nows (cannot occur w/ other points, other nows)
OS.linkedContent: Aristotle: points like nows (cannot occur w/ other points, other nows)

OS.content: for Aristotle, the point gives to length its continuity and limit, an end and a beginning (arkhē kai teleutē); but ‘now’ is not to time what point is to line, because successive arrests does not give time (ne donne pas le temps); instead, now is neither time’s origin, end or limit (to the extent that it belongs to time) > instead, must conceive of gramme [French] not as line (by way of its parts or points) but as a line in act, by way of its extremities (ta eskhata)
OS.linkedContent: for Aristotle, the point gives to length its continuity and limit, an end and a beginning (arkhē kai teleutē); but ‘now’ is not to time what point is to line, because successive arrests does not give time (ne donne pas le temps); instead, now is neither time’s origin, end or limit (to the extent that it belongs to time) > instead, must conceive of gramme [French] not as line (by way of its parts or points) but as a line in act, by way of its extremities (ta eskhata)

OS.content: this would be a gramme that erases its tracing in a circle, removes limit of point
OS.linkedContent: this would be a gramme that erases its tracing in a circle, removes limit of point

OS.content: like “point: line,” now as limit (peras) is only time’s accident, time not thought on basis of now, thus mathematization of time has limits (always accidents/potentialities) [taken in all senses]
OS.linkedContent: like “point: line,” now as limit (peras) is only time’s accident, time not thought on basis of now, thus mathematization of time has limits (always accidents/potentialities) [taken in all senses]

POS.content: double, interval, biphase, biface, bifurcated writing can only be marked in a grouped textual field, not in a punctual position, not w/ a single author
POS.linkedContent: double, interval, biphase, biface, bifurcated writing can only be marked in a grouped textual field, not in a punctual position, not w/ a single author

SP.content: fine point (of spur) cannot be honed (effiler) in single stroke (coup)
SP.linkedContent: fine point (of spur) cannot be honed (effiler) in single stroke (coup)

PS.content: Hölderlin, Mallarmé: inspiration is the pure point at which it is missing [quoted from Blanchot]
PS.linkedContent: Hölderlin, Mallarmé: inspiration is the pure point at which it is missing [quoted from Blanchot]

PS.content: Derrida on how the question he posed (like throwing a net around entire textual network) forced the substitution of discourse for the punctuality of the position
PS.linkedContent: Derrida on how the question he posed (like throwing a net around entire textual network) forced the substitution of discourse for the punctuality of the position

DIF.content: use words for their strategic convenience to deconstruct at most decisive point
DIF.linkedContent: use words for their strategic convenience to deconstruct at most decisive point

O.content: absolute knowledge present at 0 point of philosophical exposition: saturate text w/ meaning (sens), teleologically equate it [the text?] w/ its (sa) conceptual tenor
O.linkedContent: absolute knowledge present at 0 point of philosophical exposition: saturate text w/ meaning (sens), teleologically equate it [the text?] w/ its (sa) conceptual tenor

O.content: point of ontotheological fusion reduces precipitation & after-affect (dehiscence btwn vouloir-dire & writing, anticipation & recapitulation) to sublatables [mouvement de tête]
O.linkedContent: point of ontotheological fusion reduces precipitation & after-affect (dehiscence btwn vouloir-dire & writing, anticipation & recapitulation) to sublatables [mouvement de tête]

O.content: “la dissémination traite—sur lit (doctors, reads, on bed)—le point où le mouvement de la signification viendrait régulièrement lier le jeu de la trace en produisant ainsi l’histoire”
O.linkedContent: “la dissémination traite—sur lit (doctors, reads, on bed)—le point où le mouvement de la signification viendrait régulièrement lier le jeu de la trace en produisant ainsi l’histoire”

O.content: dissemination blows up (saute) security of point, arrested in name of the law: it is at the risk, to risk this blowup (to make this jump, faire sauter) that dissem. broaches/has been broached
O.linkedContent: dissemination blows up (saute) security of point, arrested in name of the law: it is at the risk, to risk this blowup (to make this jump, faire sauter) that dissem. broaches/has been broached

DPi.content: DP speaks in 3rd person present (can’t say: “I am no more”), copula signifies instantaneous passage from being to nothingness (“he is no more”): stigmē, Most High, Last Judgment, God’s verdict (always instant of death of a 3rd party, never me, you, us)
DPi.linkedContent: DP speaks in 3rd person present (can’t say: “I am no more”), copula signifies instantaneous passage from being to nothingness (“he is no more”): stigmē, Most High, Last Judgment, God’s verdict (always instant of death of a 3rd party, never me, you, us)

DPi.content: unlike Heidegger, Levinas, Derrida asks question of DP before death > pre-comprehending indubitable separation of state of life from state of death calculated by other, by 3rd party, common sense: the point, blade of knife, instant of passing, stigmē of a point; how could we know this clear-cut, sharp limit?
DPi.linkedContent: unlike Heidegger, Levinas, Derrida asks question of DP before death > pre-comprehending indubitable separation of state of life from state of death calculated by other, by 3rd party, common sense: the point, blade of knife, instant of passing, stigmē of a point; how could we know this clear-cut, sharp limit?

DPi.content: calculable credit granted to word “death” indexed to presuppositions in which “capital punishment” finds its place: where it’s indissociable from murder/suicide
DPi.linkedContent: calculable credit granted to word “death” indexed to presuppositions in which “capital punishment” finds its place: where it’s indissociable from murder/suicide

TB.content: for Benjamin, fleeting (flüchtig), infinitely small point of contact where 2 bodies of text touch > movement of love: “pass into its own language the mode of intention of the original”
TB.linkedContent: for Benjamin, fleeting (flüchtig), infinitely small point of contact where 2 bodies of text touch > movement of love: “pass into its own language the mode of intention of the original”

CHM.content: hyperbolical (mad) audacity of Cartesian Cogito (critical experience of which we may be too self-assured to experience): return to original point, zero point, where determined meaning & nonmeaning come together in their common origin
CHM.linkedContent: hyperbolical (mad) audacity of Cartesian Cogito (critical experience of which we may be too self-assured to experience): return to original point, zero point, where determined meaning & nonmeaning come together in their common origin

CHM.content: (Foucault’s narration imbedded w/in impenetrable point of certainty, as are all projects of thinking totality by escaping it) > can only escape, w/in existence, in direction of infinity or nothingness, this margin of the possible: not human (as in anthropological factuality, but demonic/metaphysical), first awakens to itself in war w/ evil genius, resists him by reducing natural man w/in: nothing less reassuring than Cogito at its proper and inaugural moment
CHM.linkedContent: (Foucault’s narration imbedded w/in impenetrable point of certainty, as are all projects of thinking totality by escaping it) > can only escape, w/in existence, in direction of infinity or nothingness, this margin of the possible: not human (as in anthropological factuality, but demonic/metaphysical), first awakens to itself in war w/ evil genius, resists him by reducing natural man w/in: nothing less reassuring than Cogito at its proper and inaugural moment

CHM.content: Cogito, exceeding totality of world like epekeina tes ousias (Glaucon: “Lord what demonic hyperbole (daimonias hyperboles)?” [banally translated as “marvelous transcendence”]
CHM.linkedContent: Cogito, exceeding totality of world like epekeina tes ousias (Glaucon: “Lord what demonic hyperbole (daimonias hyperboles)?” [banally translated as “marvelous transcendence”]

CHM.content: this demonic hyperbole more excessive than hybris, passion > opens, founds, makes possible
CHM.linkedContent: this demonic hyperbole more excessive than hybris, passion > opens, founds, makes possible

CHM.content: doubt & Cartesian Cogito punctuated by “unprecedented” excess, overflows totality (beings, factual history, determined meanings)
CHM.linkedContent: doubt & Cartesian Cogito punctuated by “unprecedented” excess, overflows totality (beings, factual history, determined meanings)

CHM.content: to place w/in determined historical structure risks dulling point itself (doing violence)
CHM.linkedContent: to place w/in determined historical structure risks dulling point itself (doing violence)

RGE.content: for Bataille, laughter is extreme point of “experience,” makes Hegelian discourse dislocate itself > must know what one’s laughing at, a complicity w/out reserve
RGE.linkedContent: for Bataille, laughter is extreme point of “experience,” makes Hegelian discourse dislocate itself > must know what one’s laughing at, a complicity w/out reserve

RGE.content: Bataille: find words to reintroduce sovereign silence—at a point, interrupt articulated language
RGE.linkedContent: Bataille: find words to reintroduce sovereign silence—at a point, interrupt articulated language

RGE.content: reactionary movement & revolutionary movement: too full of meaning (via Aufhebung), these contradictions lack pertinence, at a very determined point [Bataille’s sovereign point?]
RGE.linkedContent: reactionary movement & revolutionary movement: too full of meaning (via Aufhebung), these contradictions lack pertinence, at a very determined point [Bataille’s sovereign point?]

RGE.content: one understands nothing about strategy if one renounces any regulation of ascertaining nonpertinence (if one puts it in the hands of the left or the right)
RGE.linkedContent: one understands nothing about strategy if one renounces any regulation of ascertaining nonpertinence (if one puts it in the hands of the left or the right)

Gii.content: Ort as point of spear (die Spitze des Speers), first & foremost has power of gathering
Gii.linkedContent: Ort as point of spear (die Spitze des Speers), first & foremost has power of gathering

Gii.content: “everything concurs and conveys toward the point,” site always a site of gathering
Gii.linkedContent: “everything concurs and conveys toward the point,” site always a site of gathering

Gii.content: acc. Heidegger, great poet resists forces of dissemination or dislocation, privilege granted to unicity, value of gathering (indivisibility [?])
Gii.linkedContent: acc. Heidegger, great poet resists forces of dissemination or dislocation, privilege granted to unicity, value of gathering (indivisibility [?])

REST.content: [epigraph] “POINTURE (Latin punctura), synonym for prick, blade that fixes page to be printed on tympan, hole which it makes in the paper
REST.linkedContent: [epigraph] “POINTURE (Latin punctura), synonym for prick, blade that fixes page to be printed on tympan, hole which it makes in the paper

REST.content: interlacing of interruption points, a purely faked multiplicity [Derrida confessing about the multiple voices, the dialogue occurring in essay?], periods remain w/out destination, but they have authority in common [cf. ATM how do interruptions interlace?]
REST.linkedContent: interlacing of interruption points, a purely faked multiplicity [Derrida confessing about the multiple voices, the dialogue occurring in essay?], periods remain w/out destination, but they have authority in common [cf. ATM how do interruptions interlace?]

REST.content: point does not bring foot in contact w/ a surface, doesn’t spread out on a surface (the soles, the ground)—surface is lower than the foot, goes lowest (Derrida’s never examined this)
REST.linkedContent: point does not bring foot in contact w/ a surface, doesn’t spread out on a surface (the soles, the ground)—surface is lower than the foot, goes lowest (Derrida’s never examined this)

REST.content: from Van Gogh’s shoes to Freud’s show fetish to Bataille’s “Big Toe” > from market de la pointure (of sizes), rising/falling stocks, to speculation on Bataille [general economy]
REST.linkedContent: from Van Gogh’s shoes to Freud’s show fetish to Bataille’s “Big Toe” > from market de la pointure (of sizes), rising/falling stocks, to speculation on Bataille [general economy]

REST.content: by owing the truth, one restitutes it, identifying as assigning points or proper size (pointure)
REST.linkedContent: by owing the truth, one restitutes it, identifying as assigning points or proper size (pointure)

REST.content: how can we distinguish 2 textures of invisibility from each other, piercing (trouant) all this [the frame’s hole in the canvas, the painted shoes’ eyelets] w/ a single pointure?
REST.linkedContent: how can we distinguish 2 textures of invisibility from each other, piercing (trouant) all this [the frame’s hole in the canvas, the painted shoes’ eyelets] w/ a single pointure?

REST.content: i.e. nails in painting, pointure (Klee paints his nails in Constructif-impressionnant)
REST.linkedContent: i.e. nails in painting, pointure (Klee paints his nails in Constructif-impressionnant)

REST.content: to make fit, at all costs, forcing things, violence, sharpen to a point: give in
REST.linkedContent: to make fit, at all costs, forcing things, violence, sharpen to a point: give in

REST.content: [Derrida’s countermeasure] detachment & détaille (TN. cutting into pieces, taking away the size or measure from something)
REST.linkedContent: [Derrida’s countermeasure] detachment & détaille (TN. cutting into pieces, taking away the size or measure from something)

REST.content: Derrida’s “close reading,” a policing, “if police there is (and isn’t there always),” played out via the size (pointure) of a comma, that which separates “pair” (of shoes) from “the product” > not a temporal interval but a syntactic fact
REST.linkedContent: Derrida’s “close reading,” a policing, “if police there is (and isn’t there always),” played out via the size (pointure) of a comma, that which separates “pair” (of shoes) from “the product” > not a temporal interval but a syntactic fact

REST.content: fort/da not a relation of opposition, each notion offers an eyelet to be traversed by the other, to the figure or the pointure of the other (Heidegger’s playing w/ the bobbin)
REST.linkedContent: fort/da not a relation of opposition, each notion offers an eyelet to be traversed by the other, to the figure or the pointure of the other (Heidegger’s playing w/ the bobbin)

REST.content: putting shoes on acc. its own size (sa pointure)? unconscious of Shapiro/Heidegger puts something of his own (sien) in them? > no, à la pointure du fantôme (the ghost’s size), of the unconscious of the other, in the final account (tout compte fait)
REST.linkedContent: putting shoes on acc. its own size (sa pointure)? unconscious of Shapiro/Heidegger puts something of his own (sien) in them? > no, à la pointure du fantôme (the ghost’s size), of the unconscious of the other, in the final account (tout compte fait)

REST.content: disparate: that which opens up fort: da of shoe size (pointure), possibility of dis-pairing, play of dis/appearing > double, Doppelgänger, not pair (unadaptable to walking [à la marche])
REST.linkedContent: disparate: that which opens up fort: da of shoe size (pointure), possibility of dis-pairing, play of dis/appearing > double, Doppelgänger, not pair (unadaptable to walking [à la marche])

PIO.content: for de Man, irony is structure of instant: “climaxes in…single brief moment of a final pointe” (“a synchronic structure”); allegory (other face of irony) unfolds in diachronic of narrative
PIO.linkedContent: for de Man, irony is structure of instant: “climaxes in…single brief moment of a final pointe” (“a synchronic structure”); allegory (other face of irony) unfolds in diachronic of narrative

D.content: Derrida’s text: re-marks passage [in Soller’s], repeats square by closing angle, opens another surface of writing to-come: play w/ cardo, hinge, cardinal points; remarque d’angle: all lines broken
D.linkedContent: Derrida’s text: re-marks passage [in Soller’s], repeats square by closing angle, opens another surface of writing to-come: play w/ cardo, hinge, cardinal points; remarque d’angle: all lines broken

D.content: contraction into a dot (point), to where everything is present but nothing exists, pleroma, Orphic explanation [?], “drama of God,” zimzum, God going out of himself takes place [can find this in Hegel] > repetition of absolute present or undifferentiated origin
D.linkedContent: contraction into a dot (point), to where everything is present but nothing exists, pleroma, Orphic explanation [?], “drama of God,” zimzum, God going out of himself takes place [can find this in Hegel] > repetition of absolute present or undifferentiated origin

EL.content: secularize (desacralize): remove point, sting (Stachel), apocalyptic thorn of language > sting, this teleological aim (visée), institutes sacredness of language > this sacred language (Hebrew) would be nothing w/out magnetized pointer of apocalypse (cette pointe aimantée d’apocalypse)
EL.linkedContent: secularize (desacralize): remove point, sting (Stachel), apocalyptic thorn of language > sting, this teleological aim (visée), institutes sacredness of language > this sacred language (Hebrew) would be nothing w/out magnetized pointer of apocalypse (cette pointe aimantée d’apocalypse)

LI.content: iterability disrupts presence, unity of ego in sender, du maintenant-écrivain (grasping w/ 1 hand his ballpoint pen) > stigmè of every mark already split
LI.linkedContent: iterability disrupts presence, unity of ego in sender, du maintenant-écrivain (grasping w/ 1 hand his ballpoint pen) > stigmè of every mark already split

TN.content: for Nancy, always about touching the limit, the extreme, tip, point, that which can’t be touched
TN.linkedContent: for Nancy, always about touching the limit, the extreme, tip, point, that which can’t be touched

TN.content: philosophy—idealization, intuitionism as philosophy itself, where seeing the blind spot, a point, is touching it > fullness of immediate presence: actuality of what se donne en acte, energetically, effectively: hapto-tropologic metaphysics comes to its plenitude, pleroma
TN.linkedContent: philosophy—idealization, intuitionism as philosophy itself, where seeing the blind spot, a point, is touching it > fullness of immediate presence: actuality of what se donne en acte, energetically, effectively: hapto-tropologic metaphysics comes to its plenitude, pleroma

TN.content: always writing a story, tangent touches line/surface w/out intersection, a tangent touches one point, point is nothing, a limit w/out depth or surface, untouchable even as a figure
TN.linkedContent: always writing a story, tangent touches line/surface w/out intersection, a tangent touches one point, point is nothing, a limit w/out depth or surface, untouchable even as a figure

TN.content: hierarchy/teleology [au sommet]: willing subject, quasi-sense that is touch (ultrasense), the hand [the whole hand, not just tip of an extremely pointy fingernail (ongle extrêmement aigu)]
TN.linkedContent: hierarchy/teleology [au sommet]: willing subject, quasi-sense that is touch (ultrasense), the hand [the whole hand, not just tip of an extremely pointy fingernail (ongle extrêmement aigu)]

TN.content: Bergson: all philosophers see one point, a contact more than vision
TN.linkedContent: Bergson: all philosophers see one point, a contact more than vision

TN.content: Nancy might add, the point is not a point (indivisible), but the point, punctuality, is divisible, a touchable limit, spacing forever
TN.linkedContent: Nancy might add, the point is not a point (indivisible), but the point, punctuality, is divisible, a touchable limit, spacing forever

TN.content: exigo, ex-ago: to push, finish, require (exiger), on time [punctual]

eyes meet, infinitely, mouths in contact [unsatisfied w/ insipid figures, however interesting/necessary], thought begins, jusqu’à l’abîme, plunging Narcissus into abyss: makes day or night possible > day and night themselves promising each other, au point du jour
TN.linkedContent: eyes meet, infinitely, mouths in contact [unsatisfied w/ insipid figures, however interesting/necessary], thought begins, jusqu’à l’abîme, plunging Narcissus into abyss: makes day or night possible > day and night themselves promising each other, au point du jour

BSi.content: point d’intraduisibilité (point of untranslatability, no untranslatability [at all]): no pure translation or untranslation (I can spend a page explaining what can’t be translated)
BSi.linkedContent: point d’intraduisibilité (point of untranslatability, no untranslatability [at all]): no pure translation or untranslation (I can spend a page explaining what can’t be translated)

BSi.content: Valéry wagers on CAP: le cap Pensée; the high point (comble) of internal politics, a multipli-city of selves, when the excess that exceeds un-counts the other & outside > jealousy is always the hight point that completes me, supplements me because receives, welcomes, no longer chases out other in me: one only ever jealous of oneself, the selfsame > explains all the loves and wars (which take place btwn the same, the others as the same): as soon as there’s a double capitalized phallic erection (CAP, standing, being on a cape) here called Thought

BSi.content: division or parting of pinpoint (punctuality of now) in Celan

OG.content: simultaneity is still linear because it brings two absolute points of presence together
OG.linkedContent: simultaneity is still linear because it brings two absolute points of presence together

OG.content: Lévi-Strauss: proper names are a quanta of signification below which all people do is point > this zero degree of language, pointing, “sensible-certitude”: a myth effaced by play of difference
OG.linkedContent: Lévi-Strauss: proper names are a quanta of signification below which all people do is point > this zero degree of language, pointing, “sensible-certitude”: a myth effaced by play of difference

OG.content: death, violence, impossibility of pure point, “point vocative,” death of absolutely proper naming (the other as pure other) is death of pure idiom
OG.linkedContent: death, violence, impossibility of pure point, “point vocative,” death of absolutely proper naming (the other as pure other) is death of pure idiom

OG.content: language couples prohibition & transgression endlessly, point of nonreplacement doesn’t exist > that which is elusive in our indestructible & mortal desire

OG.content: neume, epoch of natural languages: fête autour du point d’eau, temps de l’Isle de Saint-Pierre [?]: l’image fixant ce qui ne fut qu’un point de pur passage—la limite toujours déjà franchie, rèpere absolu
